GenAiFunction.description: - Use this action to get comprehensive user context information formatted as a readable string for AI agents - Returns user details (ID, name, email, language, timezone), organization information (ID, base URL), and current date/time - Also includes any additional user-specific information stored in the system for personalized assistance - User and time specific information is needed for creating user-filtered queries or handling relative time expressions like "last week" or "my accounts" - The Org Base URL is needed whenever you construct Links to records or pages in the Org - Output is formatted as dash-separated bullet points for easy parsing
